name: apply
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: apply
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to request something, usually officially, especially in writing or by sending in a form
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指通过书面或表格形式）申请，请求

example.eg: By the time I saw the job advertised it was already too late to apply.
example.egtrans: 我看到招聘广告的时候，已经太晚了，错过了应聘时机。

example.eg: I've applied for a new job with the local newspaper.
example.egtrans: 我已经申请了地方报纸的一个职位。

example.eg: Please apply in writing to the address below.
example.egtrans: 请将书面申请寄到以下地址。

example.eg: We've applied to a charitable organization for a grant for the project.
example.egtrans: 我们已经向一家慈善组织提出申请，请求其对这个项目提供资助。

example.eg: Mandy applied to join the police.

dsense.name: apply
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: (especially of rules or laws) to have a connection or be important
trans_examp.trans_cn: （尤指规章法律）适用，有关，涉及

example.eg: That part of the form is for UK citizens - it doesn't apply to you.
example.egtrans: 表格的那一项是给英国公民填的——和你无关。

example.eg: Those were old regulations - they don't apply any more.
example.egtrans: 那些都是旧规定，不再适用了。

dsense.name: apply
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to make use of something or use it for a practical purpose

example.eg: He wants a job in which he can apply his foreign languages.
example.egtrans: 他想找一份工作，可以用到他的多门外语知识。

example.eg: The court heard how the driver had failed to apply his brakes in time.
example.egtrans: 法庭听司机陈述了他如何没能及时刹车的原委。

example.eg: If you apply pressure to a cut it's meant to stop the bleeding.
example.egtrans: 如果你按压住伤口，就会止住流血。

dsense.name: apply
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to spread or rub a substance such as cream or paint on a surface

example.eg: Apply the cream liberally to exposed areas every three hours and after swimming.
example.egtrans: 每3小时及游泳后将防晒霜充分涂抹于身体裸露部位。

example.eg: The paint should be applied thinly and evenly.
example.egtrans: 漆应该薄薄地刷上一层，且要刷得均匀。

dsense.name: apply
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense_body_def_block_kk.def: If you apply yourself to something, you work hard at it, directing your abilities and efforts in a determined way so that you succeed.

example.eg: You can solve any problem if you apply yourself.
example.egtrans: 如果你努力，任何问题都能解决。
